title: Pixel 2 XL stuck in Fastboot mode
content:
Hi guys, when I upgrade the Pixel 2 XL to android 11 with the new Android Flash Tool the phone got stuck with the android letters.

But when I rebooted the phone, I got a "corrupted phone" message error and every time I turn it on it turns on fastboot mode (already go to recovery mode and did whipe and reset, but nothing happens, same fastboot loop). 

I try to connect it to the computer but the ADB does not recognize to install a factory image. 

I do not know what to do.
